A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So as a big star wars fan i have seen this movie twice\, once with my wife\, and once with whole family. Too be blunt i wanted to like it a lot\, but  my expectations were so high the first time\, I think it was a major let down in some ways. Upon a second viewing however\, i liked it more and saw the appeal for the new Star Wars generation. While i think Rian Johnson took a crap on everything JJ Abrams set up\, it is still a decent action movie and we get some some good development\, even if it was way outside anything i was expecting. Also i Love !!! all the actors in this they do their best to convey the story\, all of them including the new additions are fantastic. But what i really don't like about this movie is  the fragmented story telling ( with plot lines that don't go anywhere)\, Some of the humor is way over the top\, so much so i think it reminds us this is just a movie vs trying to transport us into this other universe for the long 2 and half hours we are watching this movie...  Finally i think while trying to make a major Carrie Fisher tribute ( which i think was a great idea)\, they ruin it by giving her probably one of the dumbest and goofiest things to happen in  Star Wars..
